DOC.detailed_description: The University Florida operate SMART program , offer four relationship education program , target different population : ( 1 ) Relationship Smarts PLUS , high school youth ; ( 2 ) Before You Tie Knot , couple interested marriage ; ( 3 ) ELEVATE , couple , ( 4 ) Smart Steps , couple stepfamilies . All programming offer University Florida 's IFAS Extension service Citrus , Duval , Manatee , Palm Beach , Santa Rosa county . The STREAMS evaluation test text messaging strategy couple enrolled ELEVATE Smart Steps . It examine whether text message inform behavioral insight theory improve couple ' attendance relationship skills education group session , , kinds message effective . ACF staff note among common technical assistance request HMRE grantee help improve participation . Even relationship skill session offer convenient location adult receive service even program offer transportation , child care assistance facilitate regular program attendance , achieve consistent participation voluntary program challenge . The University Florida study help address challenge examine whether text message base behavioral theory work simple , practical strategy improve program participation group session . More broadly , site also add large grow effort across federal government study use behavioral intervention `` nudge '' improve social program .
